name: Alien Survivors
description:
Made for TOJam 2022

Fight against an ever-growing horde of malicious space aliens... and goats. Collect experience to get random upgrades. Every fight is a bit different!

Controls:

  • Escape to pause
  • WASD to move and mouse to aim
  • 1 2 3 to select weapons
  • Q and E to use utility items

Notes:

  • If you've survived for more than 6 minutes and there are no enemies CONGRATS! YOU SURVIVED!
  • I will be adding an ending some time soon

Assets Used

  • Rewired  Input - Guavaman Enterprises
  • Samples from Soniss GDC sound effect bundles 2017-2020
  • Samples from freesound.org
  • Hobotek - Back to Attack (Analogue Action) from freemusicarchive.org
  • Goldman and Bowlby One SC from Google Fonts
  • Low-poly Goat on a Pole by Numizmatic
  • "Resource Box" by MRowa is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution
  • "Floor Tiles Parts" by antoniojmonteiro is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution
  • "Sci-Fi Walls" by Daniel Ryan is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution
